8791f1c9-b8bc-42d9-95b4-95a1af5a3741.name: Host_count_prct
8791f1c9-b8bc-42d9-95b4-95a1af5a3741.formula: (count(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, metric=badge|health, depth=2})/avg(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=vSphere World, objectname=vSphere World, attribute=summary|total_number_hosts}))*100

828e7ef9-aa50-4227-a328-784e33cf3e15.name: VM_Count_prct
828e7ef9-aa50-4227-a328-784e33cf3e15.formula: (count(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=VirtualMachine, metric=badge|health, depth=1})/avg(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=vSphere World, objectname=vSphere World, metric=summary|total_number_vms}))*100

5b74c4a8-72f9-4e9e-b9ec-9f82e5340557.name: Storage_Count_prct
5b74c4a8-72f9-4e9e-b9ec-9f82e5340557.formula: (count(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=Datastore, metric=badge|health, depth=1})/avg(${adaptertype=Container, objecttype=Storage_Status, objectname=AllDatastore_withoutLocal, metric=Super Metric|sm_326bf60b-f1e5-4bfc-aff2-12642192642c}))*100

31289b3f-2679-4d60-b53d-3a63664ca489.name: Cluster_Count_prct
31289b3f-2679-4d60-b53d-3a63664ca489.formula: (count(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=ClusterComputeResource, metric=badge|health, depth=1})/avg(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=vSphere World, objectname=vSphere World, metric=summary|total_number_clusters}))*100
